AT.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
AT.description: Die Haltmann OHG überfällt mit ihrer Roboter-Armee den Planeten Pop. Nur Kirby kann ihre finsteren Pläne durchkreuzen – in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Stell dich den fiesen Widersachern mit Kirbys altbekannten - sowie einigen brandneuen - Spezial-Fähigkeiten entgegen. Nutze die gegnerische Technologie gegen deine Feinde, indem du die Kontrolle über den mächtigen Robobot-Panzer übernimmst! Von der Aufregung des Hauptabenteuers kannst du dich bei lustigen Minispielen erholen: Bei Kirbys Teamjagd räumst du mit Freunden böse Bosse aus dem Weg und in Kirbys 3D Arena jagst du einen Highscore nach dem anderen. Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
AU.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble! Visit amiibo.nintendo.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BR.name: Kirby Planet Robobot™
BR.description: Utilize o poder de uma misteriosa armadura mecanizada para deter a perversa empresa Haltmann Works, que está mecanizando o mundo de Kirby. Acabe com obstáculos robustos, erga objetos com facilidade e analise seus inimigos para mudar de forma, copiar habilidades e usar poderosas versões modificadas delas neste energético jogo de plataforma de ação! Isso mesmo! A armadura Robobot de Kirby pode mudar de forma ao analisar inimigos e copiar habilidades, como a nova Jet. Além disso, Kirby™ pode também copiar habilidades da maneira antiga, ao inalar inimigos! Após salvar o mundo, junte-se a 3 amigos para triunfar em Team Kirby Clash, um jogo de luta para 4 jogadores onde você escolhe uma entre várias classes e sobe de nível para vencer. Quer um jogo rápido? Aceite o desafio em 3D e obtenha uma pontuação alta em Kirby 3D Rumble.

movies.name: Trailer de lançamento Kirby Planet Robobot™

BG.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
BG.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble! Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
BE.description: La planète Pop est envahie par la société Haltmann SA et son armée de robots ravageurs ! Seul Kirby peut les arrêter dans Kirby: Planet Robobot. Affrontez cette entreprise maléfique avec les célèbres pouvoirs de Kirby, dont certains sont totalement inédits ! Retournez les pouvoirs de la société Haltmann SA contre elle-même en prenant le contrôle de la puissante Armure Robobot ! Pour souffler un peu, vous pouvez vous détendre avec des mini-jeux : faites équipe avec vos amis et mesurez-vous à des boss dans L'attaque des Kirby, ou visez le meilleur score dans Les défis 3D de Kirby ! Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

CA.name: Kirby Planet Robobot™
CA.description: Harness the power of a mysterious mech to stop ruthless invaders from mechanizing Kirby’s home world. Smash through tough obstacles, lift heavy objects with ease, and scan enemies to shape-shift into new Modes with powerful abilities in this supercharged action-platformer! That’s right—Kirby’s Robobot Armor can shape-shift into different modes by scanning enemies to copy their moves—like the new Jet Mode. Not to mention, Kirby™ can copy abilities the old-fashioned way too—by inhaling them! After saving the world, team up with three friends to defeat foes in Team Kirby Clash, an RPG-styled 4-player brawl where you choose from varied roles and level them up.

ES.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
ES.description: El planeta Pop está siendo invadido por la Corporación Haltmann y su ejército robótico, y solo Kirby puede detenerlo en Kirby: Planet Robobot. Lucha contra la malvada corporación usando las características habilidades de copia de Kirby, incluidas algunas completamente nuevas, y vuelve su propia tecnología contra ella gracias a la potente armadura Robobot. También te puedes tomar un respiro de la aventura principal con algunos minijuegos de lo más divertidos: forma equipo con amigos para enfrentarte a los jefes en "¡Todos juntos! Héroes legendarios", o para alcanzar la máxima puntuación en "Desafíos 3D de Kirby". Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. Para poder usar amiibo en las consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL y Nintendo 2DS, es necesario disponer de un lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS.

HK.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot (英文版)
HK.description: 駕馭著一個神秘盔甲的力量，去阻止冷酷無情的侵略者去機械化卡比的家園。在這充滿刺激的動作遊戲，粉碎堅硬的障礙物、輕易提起重物、及透過掃瞄敵人去轉化至不同擁有強大力量的模式！ 對的，卡比的Robobot Armor可以透過掃瞄敵人去複製對方的動作，從而轉化至不同的模式—像新的Jet Mode。除此之外，卡比也可以以傳統的方式—把它們吸入，來複製對方的能力。當拯救完世界後，與三位朋友結伍在Team Kirby Clash — 一款RPG風格的4人群鬥中擊敗敵人及提升等級。

IT.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
IT.description: La Haltmann Works Company e il suo esercito robotico stanno per invadere il Pianeta Pop e solo Kirby può fermarli in Kirby: Planet Robobot! Affronta i nemici usando le abilità di copia che contraddistinguono Kirby (e alcune abilità tutte nuove!) e indossa la potente Armatura Robobot per fare tue le tecnologie del nemico e usarle a tuo vantaggio. Puoi inoltre fare una pausa dalla storia principale per divertirti con dei simpatici minigiochi: affronta dei boss insieme agli amici in Squadra Kirby in azione, o mira al punteggio più alto in Sfida 3D Kirby! Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS.

JP.name: 星のカービィ ロボボプラネット
JP.description: いろいろなコピー能力を使って冒険する『星のカービィ』新作がニンテンドー3DSに登場。今回は、敵の能力をスキャンしてさまざまなモードに変形するロボット「ロボボアーマー」とともに、キカイ化された世界を突き進みます。最大4人で協力するサブゲーム『みんなで！カービィハンターズ』では、ひとりでもみんなでも遊べます。

movies.name: 星のカービィ ロボボプラネット 紹介映像

MX.name: Kirby Planet Robobot™
MX.description: Domina el poder de una misteriosa armadura robótica para enfrentar a la despiadada Corporación Haltmann y salvar al planeta hogar de Kirby. ¡Destroza todo tipo de obstáculos, levanta fácilmente objetos pesados, analiza enemigos para transformar la armadura y adquiere nuevos modos con habilidades únicas en este juego de plataformas y acción sin fin! Así es, la armadura Robobot de Kirby puede analizar enemigos para copiar habilidades como el modo jet y transformarse. Además, Kirby™ puede copiar habilidades como antes, al absorber enemigos. Tras salvar al mundo podrás unirte con hasta tres amigos para acabar con enemigos en ¡Todos juntos! Héroes legendarios, un juego de pelea para 4 jugadores en donde eliges una clase y subes de nivel. ¿Quieres algo rápido? Juega en tres dimensiones y obtén la mejor puntuación en Desafíos 3D de Kirby.

movies.name: Avance para lanzamiento Kirby Planet Robobot™

NO.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
NO.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble! Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

NL.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
NL.description: Haltmann Works Company valt met een robotleger Planet Popstar binnen, en Kirby is de enige die hen kan tegenhouden in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Ga het gevecht aan met het kwaadaardige bedrijf met behulp van de unieke kopieervaardigheden van Kirby plus gloednieuwe vaardigheden, en gebruik hun eigen technologie tegen hen door het krachtige Robobot-pantser over te nemen! Mocht je even willen pauzeren tijdens het hoofdavontuur, dan kun je je ook prima vermaken met een aantal leuke minigames: werk samen met je vrienden en neem het op tegen eindbazen in Team Kirby Clash, of vecht voor de hoogste score in Kirby 3D Rumble! Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig.

NZ.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
NZ.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble! PL.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! PT.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
PT.description: O planeta Popstar está a ser invadido pelo exército robótico da Haltmann Works Company, e Kirby é o único capaz de o deter em Kirby: Planet Robobot. Leva a luta diretamente à maléfica corporação, usando as conhecidas habilidades de cópia do Kirby, além de outras novas que ele possui, e usa a sua própria tecnologia contra eles, tomando o controlo da poderosa armadura Robobot! Podes também fazer uma pausa da aventura principal e experimentar um dos divertidos minijogos: junta-te a amigos e lutem contra chefes no modo Team Kirby Clash, ou tenta atingir uma pontuação máxima em Kirby 3D Rumble! Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

movies.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™: Trailer de apresentação

RU.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Kirby: Planet Robobot только Кирби сможет дать отпор корпорации Haltmann Works Company и ее армии роботов, вторгнувшихся на планету Попстар. В борьбе со зловещей корпорацией ему помогут не только его знаменитые способности копирования, но и совершенно новые. Используйте технологию врага против него самого, получив доступ к мощным доспехам Робобота! Вы также можете отдохнуть от главного приключения и расслабиться с веселыми мини-играми: сражайтесь против боссов совместно с друзьями в Team Kirby Clash, или же доберитесь до самой вершины доски рейтингов в Kirby 3D Rumble! Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.

SE.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot™
SE.description: Planet Popstar is being invaded by the Haltmann Works Company and its robotic army, and only Kirby can put a stop to it in Kirby: Planet Robobot. Take the fight to the evil corporation using Kirby's trademark Copy Abilities plus all-new abilities, and turn their own technology against them by taking control of the powerful Robobot Armour! Take a break from the main adventure, you can also get stuck into some fun minigames: partner with pals to take on bosses in Team Kirby Clash, or go for a high score in Kirby 3D Rumble! Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

TW.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot (英文版)
TW.description: 駕馭著一個神秘盔甲的力量，去阻止冷酷無情的侵略者去機械化卡比的家園。在這充滿刺激的動作遊戲，粉碎堅硬的障礙物、輕易提起重物、及透過掃瞄敵人去轉化至不同擁有強大力量的模式！ 對的，卡比的Robobot Armor可以透過掃瞄敵人去複製對方的動作，從而轉化至不同的模式—像新的Jet Mode。除此之外，卡比也可以以傳統的方式—把它們吸入，來複製對方的能力。當拯救完世界後，與三位朋友結伍在Team Kirby Clash — 一款RPG風格的4人群鬥中擊敗敵人及提升等級。

US.name: Kirby Planet Robobot™
US.description: Harness the power of a mysterious mech to stop ruthless invaders from mechanizing Kirby’s home world. Smash through tough obstacles, lift heavy objects with ease, and scan enemies to shape-shift into new Modes with powerful abilities in this supercharged action-platformer! That’s right—Kirby’s Robobot Armor can shape-shift into different modes by scanning enemies to copy their moves—like the new Jet Mode. Not to mention, Kirby™ can copy abilities the old-fashioned way too—by inhaling them! After saving the world, team up with three friends to defeat foes in Team Kirby Clash, an RPG-styled 4-player brawl where you choose from varied roles and level them up.
